main_definition: Cycling is an activity that involves riding a bicycle, which can have various meanings including sports, transportation, exercise, or as an idiom representing repetitive actions.

meanings_and_examples.example: John participates in competitive cycling by racing against other cyclists.
Many people use bicycles as a mode of transport to commute to work or school.
She incorporates cycling into her daily exercise routine for cardiovascular health.
He was caught in the cycle of procrastination, constantly putting off tasks.
